alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 3:03PM EST until December 21 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Unadilla affecting Otsego and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Tioga and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Tioga and Bradford Counties. Tioughnioga River At Cortland affecting Cortland County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River at Vestal. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, Cellars flood on Argonne Drive in Endwell. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 12.8 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM EST.
